name: lesspass-webextension
description: chrome and firefox web extension for LessPass
author: Guillaume Vincent <guillaume@oslab.fr>

scripts.clean: rm -rf extension/dist/ && mkdir extension/dist/ && rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm prune && npm install
scripts.zip: git archive -o build/lesspass.zip HEAD:extension && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome && rm build/lesspass.zip
scripts.build: npm run clean && gulp && npm run zip
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run release-cws && npm run release-amo
scripts.release-amo: cd extension && OK='has been submitted for review.' && web-ext sign | sed -n "s/\($OK\).*$/\1/;1,/$OK/p" | perl -pe 'BEGIN { $s=1 } END { exit $s } $s=0 if /'"$OK"'/;'
